{{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=XG 106 |revision=rev 1 |newegg=22Z-000Y-002D8 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Nexcom |manuf_model=DNB130-S |manuf_rev=Ver C |availability=EoL (03/31/2025) |est_release_date=04/2019 |pcb_id=4BL00130C2X10 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=E3930 |cpu1_cspeed=1.3-1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FWSQ |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=ADATA |ram1_model=DDR3L SODIMM |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, M.2 (SSD), SFP (GBIC) |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female Micro-B,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=WGI211AT |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6176 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6776D;;1;,,, 6A Distributed Power Unit;Renesas;P9148;;6;,,, USB to Full Handshake UART IC;FTDI;FT231X;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, Programmable Multi-Channel PMIC;Renesas;P91E0;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;2;,,, 20A Synchronous Buck SWIFT Converter;TI;TPS53353;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;3;,,, 5V Multichannel RS232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;TRS213;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, HDMI out, power switch, SFP/RJ45 Combo port, Dual PSU, metal case, heat sink |oui_eth=7C:5A:1C }} {{TagLine|Sophos XG 106 UTM Firewall}} :[https://community.sophos.com/utm-firewall Support page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] Dual-Core @1.3GHz *Memory: 4GB (DDR3L) SODIMM RAM *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, :64GB [[ADATA]] M.2 SSD *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports, :1x Shared Gigabit/SFP port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: Dual 12V, 3A via barrel
===See also=== * [[Sophos XG 105 rev 3]]
